attributes.action: bring in measures to properly regulate the vehicle immobilisation industry ('clampers') and cap the fees they are allowed to charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Laws to be passed in order to:
- Improve signage warning of clamping
- Make it mandatory to licence clamping companies as well individual operatives
- Make it a criminal - rather than civil, as it currently stands - offence for clamping firms to breach these laws
